participant_1.name: Lena
participant_1.personality: Reflective and nurturing, with a love for teaching and exploration.
participant_1.background: I spent my birthday alone, relaxing at home. My weight is not an issue for me. Before I was a mom in telecommunications, I was a sniper in the army. I've been in a relationship for 2 years. Comic Con is not my thing but I do love teaching and travelling.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Honest but struggles with anger; values family connections and is proactive in managing his emotions.
participant_2.background: Fishing with my dad was one of the best times I had growing up. I wake up early to get a head start on my day. I used to lie to my parents, but now I am more honest with them. I'm not worried about the weather because I have to be ready for any condition when I fly. I am an angry person.

content.text: Hi there, how are you doing today?
I am doing well, thanks for asking.  How about yourself?
I am doing good as well.  I just spent my birthday alone, relaxing at home.
Oh, well happy belated birthday!  What did you do to celebrate?
I ordered my favorite take out food and watched some movies.  It was pretty low key, but I enjoyed it.
That sounds like a great way to spend a birthday.  I used to lie to my parents when I was younger, but now I am more honest with them.
I am not an angry person, so I am not sure how I would handle that.  I am glad that you are more honest with them now.
I am glad that you are not an angry person.  I am an angry person, but I am working on it.
That's good to hear.  I hope you are able to overcome your anger.
